channel.title: [Deathlypvpz] Private construction is currently disabled
channel.description: I wanna know how to make construction work private, it works in the public but says its currently disabled, how do i enable it?

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Private construction is currently disabled
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

[quote=“Danielson183, post:4, topic:534607”]public static void HandleConstructionInterface(final Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
//CONSTRUCTION INTERFACES
int actionButtonId = Misc.hexToInt(c.getInStream().buffer, 0, packetSize);
switch (actionButtonId){ // 7002
case 122099://public
c.getPA().startTeleport2(2060, 3261, 0);
c.sendMessage(“You teleported to the public Construction zone.”);
c.sendMessage(“This is the place to train Construction with others!”);
c.sendMessage(“The private zone is Currently Disabled, sorry -hack3r-”);
break;

		case 122102://private
			//c.getPA().startTeleport2(2062, 3143, c.playerId * 4);
			c.sendMessage("Currently Disabled, Please Use the public zone");
			c.sendMessage("New banks/shops at public zone");
			//SpawnDaAltar(c);
			//SpawnDaTree(c);
			//SpawnDaMuneyNiggaChest(c);
			//SpawnDaBed(c);
			//SpawnLectaNiggas(c);
			//SpawnTeleporter(c);
		break;[/quote]

This part of the code message.

Delete it and try it now.If you can’t then…means you gotta do some codings with making it work.Find some tuts how to do this sorry

Read full topic
